overview:
Nandakumar has experience in various sectors in IT like Web Startups, Web development services, Social Media, SMM, Business Development & Consulting.

Nandakumar did some early stage web 2.0 startups in years 2006, 2007 & 08.

Nandakumar is founder of NDOT, India. NDOT is an IT services company focusing on Startups, Web development Services, Outsourcing, Consulting and Social Media. Started in 2008 & now it has 25+ employees & providing services all around the world.

NDOT has developed many products that meet small business needs, startups & Medium businesses.

Nandakumar is the right person to connect with when you looking for web development, IT services & Social Media support for your business needs.
